JOB DESCRIPTION
 
            
 
             
 
             
 
 : 

Familiar with all parameters in instruments like pressure, temperature, flow and level.

Familiar with pressure measuring element like Capsule, bellows, diaphragm and knowing
pressure  transmitter  calibration  and  its  apparatus.  Also  know  about  temperature  sensing
elements like RTD and its type TC and its type (like J, K, S, T, E, and R) Radiation Pyrometer
and calibration procedure of RTD

Familiar with primary elements of flow measurement like Orifice, Venturi Tube, Pitot tube,
Annubar and Rotameter. Know about installation of DPT in GAS, Liquid and Steam Service
also knows DP and FT Calibration.

Measurement of level by direct and indirect method like BOB and TAB, side Glass, Float
Method, Hydrostatic Pressure, Method, Displacer method, Bubbler tube method and Electrical
method like Capacitance type, Ultrasonic type and Radioactive. Have idea about Interface,
leveltrol. Also know about Zero Suppression and Zero Elevation. 

Know about Commissioning and Pre commissioning maintenance (shut down, break down and
preventive maintenance). Also have knowledge about Glanding. Termination of cable in JB and
MC, star-up check. Continuity test, leak test and Function test.

Familiar with Control valve, parts of control valve, calibration and operation of control valve
and symbols of control valves.

Have knowledge about controller; how it works about loop checking feedback and forward
control. Also know about HART, SCADA, PLC, and DCS.

Also know about PID diagram, calibration sheet filling, location diagram and logic diagram of
plant. 
CALIBRATION
 
        
 
             
 
             
 
 : 
Calibration of all type of transmitter, switches, gauge like pressure, temperature, flow
or level calibration of I/P and P/I converter and control valve.

3

Close loop checking.
